name: VS Code
description: The most popular code editor in the world. VS Code offers powerful features, extensions, and a great developer experience.
longDescription: Visual Studio Code is a free, open-source code editor from Microsoft that has become the industry standard. It supports virtually every programming language through extensions, includes integrated Git, debugging, and terminal. The extension marketplace offers thousands of plugins for additional features. OmniSet installs VS Code and can optionally configure popular extensions for your chosen development profile.
